about_the_game:
Enchanting and fun forest scene for VR Toolbox, complete with a variety of new props and a matching 360 background.

Props List:

  • Bush
  • Campfire
  • Foliage
  • Lantern
  • Log
  • Rock
  • Tent
  • Pine Tree
  • Willow Tree
  • Vine
  • Outdoor Floor (floor-locking like other room-type props)
detailed_description:
Enchanting and fun forest scene for VR Toolbox, complete with a variety of new props and a matching 360 background.

Props List:

  • Bush
  • Campfire
  • Foliage
  • Lantern
  • Log
  • Rock
  • Tent
  • Pine Tree
  • Willow Tree
  • Vine
  • Outdoor Floor (floor-locking like other room-type props)
name: VR Toolbox: Cartoon Forest

subs.option_text: VR Toolbox: Cartoon Forest Props DLC - $1.99

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 8.1 or 10. Windows 7 is not supported.
  • Processor: Intel i7-920 minimum, Intel i5-4590 or greater recommended
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: HTC Vive or Oculus Rift CV1 with Touch is Required

short_description: Cartoon forest props and a pre-built scene for VR Toolbox!
